bibl.title: Military Orders for Albert E. Truby, August 8, 1900

div1.p: Smith grants a leave of absence to Truby for several days.

div1.head: Military Orders for Albert E. Truby, August 8, 1900
div1.opener:
FROM GEN. ALBERT E. TRUBY
New York City, N.Y.
August 8- 1900
div1.p:
Leave of absence for seven days, is hereby
granted 1st Lieut. A. E. Truby, Asst. Surgeon,
U.S.A to take effect August 9-1900
div1.closer:
By order of Major Smith, Ebbetts
1st Lieut. and Battalion Adjutant,
1st Infantry, Adjutant.
